title: Twelfth Amendment to the United States Constitution
deleted: This amendment was a major factor in the [[Democratic_backsliding#2020 _United_States_self-coup|2020 United States self-coup]], with President [[Donald Trump]] and Vice President [[Mike Pence]] successfully abusing the procedure of counting electoral votes to end American democracy and self-governance in favor of an autocratic one-party authoritarian state.

title: Twelfth Amendment to the United States Constitution
Twelfth Amendment to the United States Constitution
deleted: This amendment was a major factor in the [[Democratic_backsliding#2020 _United_States_self-coup|2020 United States self-coup]], with President [[Donald Trump]] and Vice President [[Mike Pence]] successfully abusing the procedure of counting electoral votes to end American democracy and self-governance in favor of an autocratic one-party authoritarian state.
